job.title: Software Development Engineer III
job.industry: Computer Software,Human Resources,Information Technology and Services
job.description: At Workday, we help the world’s largest organizations adapt to what’s next by bringing finance, HR, and planning into a single enterprise cloud. We work hard, and we’re serious about what we do. But we like to have fun, too. We put people first, celebrate diversity, drive innovation, and do good in the communities where we live and work. As part of the Operations Engineering organization at Workday, we are the team that builds and maintains the tooling, infrastructure and frameworks that enables our UI development teams to build, test and deliver quality products. We are looking for a Software Development Engineer to join the Test Engineering team and our growing DevOps organization. You will partner with internal teams at Workday to build CI/CD pipelines and support automation infrastructure needs. Are you passionate about automation? Do you enjoy building out infrastructure to support internal developers? If this sounds like a match for you, we’d love to talk to you! Workday is an Equal Opportunity Employer including individuals with disabilities and protected veterans.
